item.title: This is the first post
item.description: When I told my friend hours before i started making this blog, She asked - “What’s the first post gonna be about?”. On any other day, this innocent question would’ve made me think, quite a bit, until the thought of the ideal, perfect ‘first post’ consumed all thought space until the wandering mind settled on the next shiny thing. Today was different though. Having lazed away over half a day, I decided that I shall finish setting up the blog.
